TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LocalPrintServer extends System.Printing.PrintServer
Public NotInheritable Class LocalPrintServer Inherits PrintServer
public ref class LocalPrintServer sealed : System::Printing::PrintServer

summary.span: 表示本地打印服务器（应用程序正在其上运行的计算机）和启用其打印队列的管理。

span.span: Represents the local print server (the computer on which your application is running) and enables management of its print queues.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你的应用程序将值写入的属性对象时，更改具有不起作用之前的值传递给由计算机,对象。When your application writes a value to a property of the object, that change has no effect until the value is passed to the computer that is represented by the object. 若要确保值更改生效，请使用方法。To ensure that the change in value takes effect, use the method. 此外，其他应用程序也可能更改的计算机的打印服务属性。In addition, other applications may also change the print service properties of the computer. 若要确保应用程序使用的对象具有的最新的实际值，请使用方法。To ensure that the object used by your application has the latest actual values, use the method. > [!CAUTION] > 类中命名空间不支持的 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中的使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试使用这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果你想要从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印，请参阅命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 类的实例。The following example shows how to create an instance of the class. [!code-csharp[XpsPrint#PrintQueueSnip](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsPrint/CSharp/XpsPrintHelper.cs#printqueuesnip)] [!code-vb[XpsPrint#PrintQueueSnip](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsPrint/visualbasic/xpsprinthelper.vb#printqueuesnip)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法要求对象创建与权限。The method requires that the object be created with rights. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将其与现有打印机仅在位置、 端口和共享的状态中的属性中安装第二个打印机不同的代码中使用此方法。The following example shows how to use this method in code that will install a second printer that differs in its properties from an existing printer only in location, port, and shared status. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Printing::PrintQueue ^ DefaultPrintQueue { System::Printing::PrintQueue ^ get(); void set(System::Printing::PrintQueue ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置默认打印队列。

span.span: Gets or sets the default print queue.

value.span: 被指定为本地计算机默认队列的 。

span.span: The that is designated as the default queue for the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你的应用程序将只具有默认的队列，即使你具有访问到打印服务器的权限。Your application will have only access to the default queue, even if you have rights to the print server. 若要以更高版本的访问权限打开队列，使用之一构造函数，可用于指定所需的访问级别。To open the queue with greater access, use one of the constructors that enables you to specify the desired access level. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将其与现有打印机仅在位置、 端口和共享的状态中的属性中安装第二个打印机不同的代码中使用此属性。The following example shows how to use this property in code that will install a second printer that differs in its properties from an existing printer only in location, port, and shared status. [!code-csharp[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/CSharp/Program.cs#cloneprinter)] [!code-vb[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/visualbasic/program.vb#cloneprinter)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你的应用程序将只具有默认的队列，即使你具有访问到打印服务器的权限。Your application will have only access to the default queue, even if you have rights to the print server. 若要以更高版本的访问权限打开队列，使用之一构造函数，可用于指定所需的访问级别。To open the queue with greater access, use one of the constructors that enables you to specify the desired access level. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法在运行时发现类型的打印队列，这些属性，而无需使用反射。The following example shows how to use this method to discover at run time the properties, and the types of those properties, of a print queue, without using reflection. [!code-csharp[GetPrintObjectPropertyTypesWithoutReflection#ShowPropertyTypesWithoutReflection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GetPrintObjectPropertyTypesWithoutReflection/CSharp/Program.cs#showpropertytypeswithoutreflection)] [!code-vb[GetPrintObjectPropertyTypesWithoutReflection#ShowPropertyTypesWithoutReflection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GetPrintObjectPropertyTypesWithoutReflection/visualbasic/program.vb#showpropertytypeswithoutreflection)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 更新 对象的属性，以便它们的值与对象表示的打印服务器的值匹配。

span.span: Updates the properties of the object so that their values match the values of the print server that the object represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对所做的任何更改不会写入到打印服务器使用的属性方法将会丢失时运行。Any changes that you make to properties that are not written to the print server by using the method are lost when runs.

span.span: Some properties did not update.
